description: This file defines a custom Flutter ThemeData configuration for an 'Ocean Professional' theme, including color schemes, input styles, button styles, navigation bar styles, and a surface gradient.

classes.name: ThemeData
classes.description: Represents the overall theme configuration for Flutter widgets.

classes.name: ColorScheme
classes.description: Defines a set of 13 colors that can be used to configure the color properties of most components.

classes.name: AppBarTheme
classes.description: Configures the appearance of AppBar widgets.

classes.name: CardTheme
classes.description: Customizes the look of Card widgets.

classes.name: InputDecorationTheme
classes.description: Specifies input decoration styles for form fields.

classes.name: ElevatedButtonThemeData
classes.description: Configures the style for ElevatedButton widgets.

classes.name: TextButtonThemeData
classes.description: Configures the style for TextButton widgets.

classes.name: NavigationBarThemeData
classes.description: Customizes the appearance of navigation bars.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object with custom Ocean theme configurations.

methods.name: buildSubtleSurfaceGradient
methods.description: Returns a linear gradient with a subtle top-to-bottom gradient effect for surfaces.
